TopicTitle: Why can't I transmit when I'm EVA?

Articles.Content:
Anyone know why our Kerbinauts can't transmit EVA reports from their suits? Is this something that just hasn't been implemented or is there a mod for it?

Edited November 24, 2013 by Rabid_Monkey
Probably because they have no antenna, so you need to board a vessel with a trasnmitter.
hasn't been implemented yet. its said to be possible in next updates i believe.

Kerbals in an External Seat can do EVA reports, and, if the vessel is landed, can also take Surface Samples. And since they are physically attached to the spacecraft in that seat, you have the option to instantly transmit those, if you so desire.
Have you noticed how much power transmitting takes? A Kerbal would need a coal power plant in his backpack to transmit back to KSC.
